name: The Fish Catcher
description:
Controlls:

Move: W/A/S/D

LeftMouse: Shoot Transport Beam

This is a really fun game about stealing fish from sea.

You are the UFO and you have been sent on the mission to steal fish from the earth.

But stealing fish ain't gone be easy, there is fisherman watching their fishes. So no one can't steal them and there are Pirannas over the sea who are thirsty for alien blood.

Beat you HighScore and feed your planet fresh juicy Fish.
